name: Hamelin Familiar
description:
You are Doggo, a familiar of Hamel*n. She has left you to explore the rest of the dungeon with her allies, and it's up to you to stop the invasion of monsters by matching them. Good luck!

Created by LewisAlter

Sprites, Background and Title Screen art by LewisAlter

Character full body sprite by Spring Spring from https://opengameart.org

Soundtrack by Maou Damasshi, HiLI and Makai Symphony

Special Thanks:

theo aegis - basic "chain 3" tutorial which gave me some ideas on how to tackle my approach into coding this minigame!
